caption.p: In vitro antioxidant activities using Coccoloba alnifolia extracts. (a) Total antioxidant capacity (TAC). The x-axis corresponds to different extracts, and the y-axis corresponds to the ascorbic acid equivalents in mg (AAEq mg). (b) Scavenging of the DPPH radical. The x-axis corresponds to different extracts used, and the y-axis corresponds to the percentage of DPPH scavenging. (c) Reducing power. The x-axis corresponds to different extracts, and the y-axis corresponds to the percentage of antioxidant activity. (d) Superoxide radical scavenging. The x-axis corresponds to different extracts, and the y-axis corresponds to percentage of antioxidant activity. For each assay the extract concentration used was 250 μg/mL. HE: hexane extract; CE: chloroform extract; EE: ethanol extract; ME: methanol extract; WEE: water end extract; WE: water extract. Each assay was done in triplicate, and the assays were three times. The results were analyzed using an ANOVA and Tukey's test. ∗∗∗∗Significant difference between extracts at p < 0.001; ∗∗∗Significant difference between the extracts at p < 0.01.
